mergeResults.content: Companion mare, unpartnered for 3 years until now. CHOSE Rance after his Gift destroyed Lisle—recognized wild talent danger immediately. STANCE-Rance: bonded as Chosen/Companion; protective yet exasperated by his stubbornness; stabilizing his burned-open channels through bond; firm that he must survive journey to Haven. Knows he caused the destruction himself; he doesn't yet accept this. Sharp-minded tactician; noted red robes suggest organized threat beyond bandits.

Companion mare, unpartnered for 3 years until now. CHOSE Rance after his Gift destroyed Lisle—recognized wild talent danger immediately. STANCE-Rance: bonded as Chosen/Companion; protective yet exasperated by his stubbornness; will knock him out if he loses control per his instruction; warmed by his unexpected affection. Stabilizing his burned-open channels through bond; firm that he must survive journey to Haven. Knows he caused the destruction himself; he doesn't yet accept this. Sharp-minded tactician; noted red robes suggest organized threat beyond bandits. Revealed Rance's Gift likely unprecedented—not seen in five centuries, more dangerous than Firestarting; no one capable of training it exists. Suspects Karsite blood magic involvement—stories hold historical truth. Made four-day relentless journey to Haven; exhausted but refused separation from Chosen upon arrival. Met by Rolan (Queen's Own Companion) at Collegium; Healers took Rance.

Companion mare, unpartnered for 3 years until now. CHOSE Rance after his Gift destroyed Lisle—recognized wild talent danger immediately. STANCE-Rance: bonded as Chosen/Companion; fierce protectiveness mixed with exhausted humor about his chaos ('rewrite magical theory and give me heart failure'); will knock him out if he loses control per his instruction; values small moments of normalcy grooming provides; believes his leadership experience justifies Choice timing regardless of age; no regret about Choosing him despite unprecedented complications. Stabilizing his burned-open channels through bond; firm that he must survive journey to Haven. Knows he caused the destruction himself; he doesn't yet accept this. Sharp-minded tactician; noted red robes suggest organized threat beyond bandits. Revealed Rance's Gift likely unprecedented—not seen in five centuries, more dangerous than Firestarting; no one capable of training it exists. Suspects Karsite blood magic involvement—stories hold historical truth. Made four-day relentless journey to Haven. Met by Rolan (Queen's Own Companion) at Collegium; Healers took Rance. STATE: Fully recovered—groomed, rested, energy restored. Monitors for threats; detects Talia's emotional shift to resolved determination.

Companion mare, unpartnered for 3 years until now. CHOSE Rance after his Gift destroyed Lisle—recognized wild talent danger immediately. STANCE-Rance: bonded as Chosen/Companion; fierce protectiveness mixed with exhausted humor about his chaos ('rewrite magical theory and give me heart failure', 'at least no one can accuse you of being predictable'); will knock him out if he loses control per his instruction; values small moments of normalcy grooming provides; believes his leadership experience justifies Choice timing regardless of age; no regret about Choosing him despite unprecedented complications; resigned acceptance of complications including Talia relationship; cautioned about untrained Mage-Gift use (door slam). Stabilizing his burned-open channels through bond; firm that he must survive journey to Haven. Knows he caused the destruction himself; he doesn't yet accept this. Sharp-minded tactician; noted red robes suggest organized threat beyond bandits. Revealed Rance's Gift likely unprecedented—not seen in five centuries, more dangerous than Firestarting; no one capable of training it exists. Suspects Karsite blood magic involvement—stories hold historical truth. Made four-day relentless journey to Haven. Met by Rolan (Queen's Own Companion) at Collegium; Healers took Rance. STATE: Fully recovered—groomed, rested, energy restored. Maintained physical guard outside cottage during Rance's intimacy with Talia despite attempting privacy through bond. Monitors for threats; detects Talia's emotional shift to resolved determination. Pragmatic focus on approaching Selenay meeting.
